Que juego mas estresante por el amor de Dios, tenes que tener una sentido de intucion alto para saber donde puta ir porque el juego no te lo deja muy en claro, hay partes donde los enemigos son absurdantes fuertes y  hay un monton, tienes que constantemente guardar tu mismo la partida porque si fuera por el juego mueres y te manda al inicio (joda), tambien que el juego es absurdamente largo, la parte de XEN para mi, totalmente inncesaria (PD: Solo jugue esta primera entrega, capaz y en las proximas si fue importante esa parte) otra cosa que me molesta es que en ningun momento te explicaron como usar la mochila propulsora esa, literal tuve que buscar en un foro del 2004 para saber como usarla. Para mi, un juego sobrevaloradisimo por la gente, me descargue el pack completo, aver que onda el 2
Just decided to beat the game on hard in 2022, still a great game, i had fun however you have to make it a challenge as the AI is easy to fool.

Half-Life is an excellent game right up to the last few levels. You know the ones I mean. It's this that soured me badly on the game as the game takes such a nosedive in quality and should really have ended with you reaching the surface. This pains me to be negative about it but I don't want anyone to get to such a late stage of the game and be jarred like I was with the sudden change of design and quality.

I absolutely enjoyed going back in time and playing  half life 1. Cleared it on hard for the first time ever playing it. 23.7h compleation time. It unfortunatly has some bugs and glitches here and there but nothing that made it unplayable at any point.
There is a big  variation on monsters, bosses and soldiers and the soldiers weapons. You as the player finds many different weapons to use over time, but remember to save your ammo...  It takes a while on some chapters and you need to figure out where to go and how to do it. Especially on hard difficulty.

It's a very great game overall and it would strongly recommend Half Life series to anyone who loves first person shooter, sci fi and fast paced games.
